title: Unique code extraction from hierarchical excel data
author: Priyanka Mohekar
description:
This asset will do the keyword extraction from a hierarchical excel data in WatsonX Discovery.
For this use case we received the data in an excel format. This data has an ambiguity. And the clients wanted to make sure that they can ask "Purchasing sub-category code" wrt any of the keywords in the dataset (Master category, Master Sub-category, Purchasing Category, Purchasing sub-category description Material Group).
Note:  In the code we will be referring to "Purchasing sub-category code" as 'Bcode'. We are using Granite V2 for our AI generated responses.
